subtasks: Identifying herbs and plants (e.g., African Blue Basil, Chinese chives)
Visiting another farm (Jackers Herb Farm) for inspiration
Protecting plants from harsh weather conditions (e.g., root rot prevention)
Potting up plants with appropriate soil mix
Pruning and shaping plants (e.g., water pepper plant)
Propagating perennials (e.g., taking cuttings from herbs)
